attributes.action: Ban the sale in the uk of any batteries which are not carbon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Existing legislation currently limits the types of battery that can be sold commercially in the uk.  This petition looks to benefit the environment further.  The use of Carbon Batteries is more ecologically sound than other forms of Batteries currently used (e.g. Lithium / Nickel / Zinc).  Legislation would further assist in the development of a sustainable economy.  At local and international levels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
